page.title: 15THE VILLAGE BOBBY continued
page.content: P.C.Campion never knows what jobs he might have to do each day, except for those listed by Dines Green Station.He might get a call to go out to an argument or a burglary.He might get a call to go to an accident or to round up straying animals.If he moves animals off the road into a nearby field he then has to find their owner. Sometimes he has to speak to parents about children who have been trespassing. P.C.Campion has been stationed at Alfrick for 18 months.In September 1984 he started a youth club in the village hall, because there were no clubs or groups for the village children.Some children from Suckley also attend as there is no club in their village.This club is run in his off duty time,with the help of a few other grown ups.
